00026 void ArpHost::initialize(int stage) {
00027   BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00028     if(stage==0) {
00029         offset = par("offset");
00030   }
00031 }

00033 LAddress::L2Type ArpHost::getMacAddr(const LAddress::L3Type& netwAddr) const
00034 {
00035     Enter_Method_Silent();
00036     // modification by Jerome Rousselot, CSEM
00037     // assumes that addresses are equal to host IDs
00038     // and that mac addresses == net addresses
00039     return LAddress::L2Type(netwAddr);
00040 //    debugEV << "for host[" << simulation.getModule( netwAddr )->getParentModule()->getIndex()
00041 //       << "]: netwAddr " << netwAddr << "; MAC address "
00042 //       << simulation.getModule( netwAddr )->getParentModule()->getSubmodule( "nic" )->getId() <<endl;
00043 //    return simulation.getModule(netwAddr)->getParentModule()->getSubmodule("nic")->getId();
00044 }
00045 
00046 LAddress::L3Type ArpHost::getNetwAddr(const LAddress::L2Type& macAddr) const
00047 {
00048     Enter_Method_Silent();
00049     // modification by Jerome Rousselot, CSEM
00050     // assumes that addresses are equal to host IDs
00051     // and that mac addresses == net addresses
00052 #ifdef MIXIM_INET
00053     return LAddress::L3Type(macAddr.getInt());
00054 #else
00055     return LAddress::L3Type(macAddr);
00056 #endif
00057 //    debugEV << "for host[" << simulation.getModule( macAddr )->getParentModule()->getIndex()
00058 //       << "]: macAddr " << macAddr << "; netw address "
00059 //       << simulation.getModule( macAddr )->getParentModule()->getSubmodule("nic")->getId() <<endl;
00060 //    return simulation.getModule(macAddr)->getParentModule()->getSubmodule("netw")->getId();
00061 }
00062 
00063 LAddress::L3Type ArpHost::myNetwAddr(const cModule* netw) const
00064 {
00065     // modification by Jerome Rousselot, CSEM
00066     // assumes that addresses are equal to host index.
00067     // and that mac addresses == net addresses
00068   return LAddress::L3Type(FindModule<>::findHost(netw)->getIndex()+offset);
00069 //    return netw->getId();
00070 }
00071 
00072 LAddress::L2Type ArpHost::myMacAddr(const cModule *mac) const
00073 {
00074     // modification by Jerome Rousselot, CSEM
00075   // assumes that addresses are equal to host index.
00076     // and that mac addresses == net addresses
00077   return LAddress::L2Type(FindModule<>::findHost(mac)->getIndex()+offset);
00078 //    return (mac->getParentModule())->getId();
00079 }
